alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Kent; Queen Anne's; Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 4:12AM EST until January 16 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...2 to 3 inches of snow expected. * WHERE...In Delaware, Kent. In Maryland, Kent MD, Queen Annes, Talbot and Caroline. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will begin this afternoon. Mainly snow expected this evening into tonight. A very brief period of mix precipitation may occur early Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
